e15190.utilities.atomic_mass_evaluation.get_A_Z¶

e15190.utilities.atomic_mass_evaluation.get_A_Z(notation, simple_tuple=False)¶

Converts mass-number annotated isotope expression into A and Z.

Parameters

  • notation (str) – A string that represents an isotope, e.g. ‘Ca40’ and ‘U235’.

  • simple_tuple (bool, default False) – If True, returns a simple tuple (A, Z); if False, returns a named tuple.

Examples

>>> from e15190.utilities import atomic_mass_evaluation as ame
>>> ame.get_A_Z('ca40')
(40, 20)
